com.orientechnologies.common.directmemory

Interface OByteBufferPoolMXBean

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OByteBufferPool

    public interface OByteBufferPoolMXBean
    Provides an MBean for OByteBufferPool.
    Author:
    Sergey Sitnikov

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getAllocatedMemory() 
      double getAllocatedMemoryInGB() 
      long getAllocatedMemoryInMB() 
      int getBuffersInThePool() 
      int getBufferSize() 
      int getMaxPagesPerSingleArea() 
      long getOverflowBufferCount() 
      int getPoolSize() 
      long getPreAllocatedBufferCount() 
      long getPreAllocationLimit() 

    • Method Detail

      • getBufferSize

        int getBufferSize()
        Returns:
        the buffer AKA page size in bytes of the associated OByteBufferPool.

      • getBuffersInThePool

        int getBuffersInThePool()
        Returns:
        the number of the free buffers currently in the pool of the associated OByteBufferPool.

      • getPreAllocatedBufferCount

        long getPreAllocatedBufferCount()
        Returns:
        the number of the allocated buffers of the associated OByteBufferPool, this does not include the overflow buffers.

      • getOverflowBufferCount

        long getOverflowBufferCount()
        Returns:
        the number of the allocated overflow buffers of the associated OByteBufferPool.

      • getAllocatedMemory

        long getAllocatedMemory()
        Returns:
        the current total memory allocation size in bytes of the the associated OByteBufferPool, including the overflow buffer allocations.

      • getAllocatedMemoryInMB

        long getAllocatedMemoryInMB()
        Returns:
        the current total memory allocation size in megabytes of the the associated OByteBufferPool, including the overflow buffer allocations.

      • getAllocatedMemoryInGB

        double getAllocatedMemoryInGB()
        Returns:
        the current total memory allocation size in gigabytes of the the associated OByteBufferPool, including the overflow buffer allocations.

      • getPreAllocationLimit

        long getPreAllocationLimit()
        Returns:
        Maximum amount of bytes which may be allocated using big chunks of memory

      • getMaxPagesPerSingleArea

        int getMaxPagesPerSingleArea()
        Returns:
        Amount of pages which fit in single big chunk of memory preallocated during page allocation request.

      • getPoolSize

        int getPoolSize()
        Returns:
        Size of the pool which contains records which were allocated but now were fried to the pool by database.
